H0.text: What techno group was formed in Düsseldorf in 1970. Neu!

H1.text: What techno group was formed in Düsseldorf in 1970. DAF

H2.text: What techno group was formed in Düsseldorf in 1970. Propaganda

H3.text: What techno group was formed in Düsseldorf in 1970. Craftwerk

A4.text: Neu! was formed in 1971 in Düsseldorf

A5.text: Propaganda is a German synth-pop band formed in Düsseldorf in 1982.

A6.text: Prominent groups associated with the krautrock label included Neu!, Can, Faust, Tangerine Dream, Kraftwerk, Cluster, Ash Ra Tempel, Popol Vuh, Amon Düül II and Harmonia.

A7.text: The band Kraftwerk is spelled with an 'f' after the 'k', not 'Craftwerk'.
